form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Durbin (for himself and Mrs. Fischer) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to include food allergy information in existing training modules for local food service personnel.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Children with Food Allergies Act of 2025.

section.header: Including food allergy information in existing training modules for local food service personnel

subsection.text: Section 7(g)(2)(B)(iii) of the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 (42 U.S.C. 1776(g)(2)(B)(iii)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subclauses (II) and (III) as subclauses (III) and (IV), respectively; and
by inserting after subclause (I) the following:

subclause.text: food allergies, including information on the best practices to prevent, recognize, and respond to food-related allergic reactions;

subsection.text: Section 7(g)(2)(B)(ii)(II) of the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 (42 U.S.C. 1776(g)(B)(ii)(II)) is amended by striking clause (i) and inserting clauses (i) and (iii).
